content: oak beanie v v by eera älimäki simple beanies are my favorite and this one sure is a keeper with this beanie you will be happy and warm even during the coldest of winters extra points for the fact that this one is also teen approved oak beanie is knitted from the brim up in delicious pencil roving bulky weight yarn finished measurements materials yarn 1 1 2 skein s of unelma by vuonue 100% lambs wool pencil roving 145 yds 130 m / 100 g approx 100 130 170 yds 90 120 155 m of bulky weight yarn sample knitted in color natural black needles us 8 5 mm circular needle 16 40 cm long and dpns adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge other a stitch marker and locking stitch markers tapestry needle and blocking aids sizing 1 2 3 finished measurements 16 17½ 19 40 44 48 cm in circumference at brim and 10 25 cm long gauge 18 stitches and 22 row = 4 10 cm in 1 x 1 ribbing unstretched using main needles after blocking pattern copyright © veera välimäki 2 the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com directions oak beanie is a ribbed hat that is worked easily from the brim up i highly recommend using the tubular cast on method for best result -
